title: MediTanzania Project: CS205 Capstone
desc: UNICEF-backed interactive & corruption-resistant website/database platform for improving public healthcare in Tanzania. Built collaboratively by a team of four with JS, UX design, citizen/staff portals and incorporates ML-based sentiment analysis for handling text-based aspect of surveys

title: CS205 Labs
desc: Advanced JavaScript labs from CS205: includes full-stack components and data-driven web features.

title: ECE211 Digital Circuits
desc: Sequential/Combinational circuit logic design, FSMs (from a holistic traffic light management system to customized Mustang LED designs), and Verilog circuits. Also includes testbenches, simulation, and lab report files.

title: CS150 Projects and Labs
desc: Object-oriented Java programming LABs for data structure/algorithm implementations and sophisticated PROJECTs on complex data structures and truck transport simulation.

title: LeetCode Practice
desc: Collection of algorithmic coding problems in mostly C++ and Python, systematically categorized by topic and difficulty. This will be updated soon!
